data.eml:eml: Revision of the genus Aulacophora from Taiwan (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae: Galerucinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lee, Chi-Feng, Beenen, Ron (2015): Revision of the genus Aulacophora from Taiwan (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae: Galerucinae). Zootaxa 3949 (2): 151-190, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3949.2.1
